data.title: NBCUniversal Careers
data.meta_description: Throughout the twentieth century Universal Studios and NBC have created extraordinary legacies of accomplishment in the exciting new worlds of motion picture production and distribution, location-b…
data.meta_site_name: Office of Career Strategy - Yale University
data.text: Throughout the twentieth century Universal Studios and NBC have created extraordinary legacies of accomplishment in the exciting new worlds of motion picture production and distribution, location-based entertainment, and radio and television production and broadcasting. Today, as one of Comcast Corporation’s two business units, NBCUniversal continues to break new ground as a leading global media and entertainment company.
